__e: So, in a sense, gambling was a way to numb your childhood pain.
But it was his duty, as it was mine to suffer for his suffering in my stead.
Maybe your husband's suffering was all part of God's plan.
And although I know you cannot forgive me, I wish you to know that I will always live with pain and guilt in my heart for the suffering I have caused to you and to your child.
I don't know what you think you know, but my marriage has survived more suffering than someone like you could ever grasp.
We have seen more suffering than any man should ever see and if there is going to be an end to it, it must be an end that justifies the cost.
If I end her suffering, I would serve Him for the rest of my life.
There are people... all over the world with all sorts of problems and afflictions and diseases.
But that was not enough to stop her from eventually making a choice... to leave this place... and all the suffering and me... behind.
